fields.question: WHAT DOES HEALTHCHECKS DO
fields.answer: Health Checks is a platform that monitors your con jobs and notifies you of their status.

fields.question: WHAT IS A CRON JOB
fields.answer: This are tasks that are created on your server to run automatically after a period of time

fields.question: HOW DOES IT NOTIFY ME
fields.answer: It will send notifications through your preferred channel.

fields.question: WHAT ARE THE CHANNELS OF COMMUNICATION
fields.answer: The notifications will be sent through email,sms, slack and telegram plus other common channels.

fields.question: WILL IT NAG ME
fields.answer: Yes it will nag you if you do not attend to a cron job that is down.

fields.question: WHY SHOULD I USE HEALTHCHECKS
fields.answer: It will give you peace of mind as you are sure any down time will be reported immediately.

fields.question: HOW DO I PAY
fields.answer: Payments are through mastercard, Visa, PayPal and American Express.

fields.question: WHAT PROGRAMMING LANGUAGES CAN I USE HEALTHCHECKS WITH
fields.answer: You can use it with any language that can fetch a url. Like python and ruby

fields.question: HOW LONG IS IT BETWEEN PINGS
fields.answer: You can configure the period between each ping according to your preference

fields.question: How does syncing work
fields.answer: When an email is registered any device connected to the health checks app is automatically syncronised

fields.question: Does the app work on mobile phone
fields.answer: The Site is modified to work on any App hence can be accessed on any mobile phone device
